About

Hey, thanks for stopping by and checking out my site :)

I'm a CIEL student at lamache. I work primarily with the web, but I also create software and mobile apps when I have some free time.

Just click on the contact app and send me an email!

I plan on keeping this site updated with my latest work, so stop by every now and then to see what I've been working on.
